short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: List all JavaScript files loaded by a website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly reveal all JavaScript URLs on any website with a single click. This powerful plugin is the perfect companion for WatchJS, allowing you to effortlessly submit new JavaScript files for monitoring. Stay ahead of the competition by discovering potential vulnerabilities in previously overlooked scripts. Maximize your bug bounty potential and streamline your workflow with JavaScript URL Hunter - the ultimate tool for elite bug hunters
